title: Drawing, "Siedlungstype [Housing Example (Two Rowhouse Façade Elevations with Two Floor Plans)]", ca. 1929
medium: Dark gray and blue pen, graphite and red pencil on graph paper

Drawing, "Siedlungstype [Housing Example (Two Rowhouse Façade Elevations with Two Floor Plans)]", ca. 1929.
